name: Yong
description:
Yong is a game where 2 players find themselves joined together - back to back. Both try to collect the red pellets, but as Black can only control the players movement and White can only control the direction they are facing both need to overwhelm or trick the other to make sure they reach their goal.

Controls
  • White: Mouse to rotate
  • Black: WASD to move

This game was made for the GMTK Jame 2021. The theme was joined together. I wanted to participate, but didn't have much time, so I was happy I came up with this idea which I managed to complete in about 5 hours.
